title: New York man wins $10M lottery for the second time in 3 years
description: A New York man defined lottery odds after winning $10 million from a scratch-off game, and it's the second time in three years he has won it.
content:
A New York man defined lottery odds after winning $10 million from a scratch-off game, and it's the second time in three years he has won it.
